name: Planet Rush (LAgg)
description:
Your Mission is it save your Planet from distraction .🌎

Team Name : Lagg Studio

Planet Ruch is 2d tower defiance game where you should mange your resources and power to keep your planet alive.

The game was made for the CPES Game Jam under the them of  "Broken world".

The game was made in 2 days, and all the art and code were made by the lagg studio members.

 All the music and SFX from open game art.

I hope you enjoy the game (it lacks some balance "but It's super hard to balance those type of games in one day"😊 )
